sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Link} from "react-router-dom" import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux" import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button} from "react-bootstrap" import Rating from "../components/Rating" import {listProductDetails} from "../actions/productActions" const ProductScreen = ({match}) => { const product = useSelector(state => state.productDetails) const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(listProductDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Out of Stock"} ) } export default ProductScreen
